base_subject.description: The main subject or concept for the image.

lighting.description: The desired lighting style, e.g., 'dramatic lighting', 'soft light', 'studio lighting'.

perspective.description: The desired camera perspective, e.g., 'wide angle', 'close-up', 'top-down'.

composition.description: The desired composition, e.g., 'rule of thirds', 'centered'.

modifiers.description: A list of additional style modifiers, e.g., 'hyperdetailed', '8k'.
